description: To provide the public with all relevent information regarding the outbreak, the Surinamese government created a website for public access. The website is accessible by any member of the public, but can only be edited by members of the Corona emergency response team, and associated doctors and researchers.

target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries

description: Suriname closed all schools effective March 16th. The plan is to reopen schools the 15th of April. UPDATE: Originally, the Minister of Education announced that schools will reopen on the 15th of April. However, on April 2nd, she announced that they cannot enforce existing policies in schools. As a result, schools remain closed until the policies can be enforced.
type_sub_cat: Preschool or childcare facilities (generally for children ages 5 and below)
institution_status: Preschool or childcare facilities closed/locked down
target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries
